subject: Scientific study on COVID-19 impact on startups
preview: Dear Madam or Sir,  This is a friendly reminder to take part in the survey of Profs. Theresa Veer and Alexandra Zaby on the impact of the COVID-19 crisis on startups. You find the 10 min survey here:

full_threads.body:
Dear Madam or Sir,

This is a friendly reminder to take part in the survey of Profs. Theresa
Veer and Alexandra Zaby on the impact of the COVID-19 crisis on startups.
You find the 10 min survey here:

https://www.soscisurvey.de/start-ups/?d=BRPR69N4CUM9PDNF

As a token of our respect for your time, at the end of the survey you can
decide to participate in a lottery of Amazon vouchers (1 x $250, 2 x $100,
10 x $50). We will send out the vouchers to the winners of the lottery via
e-mail four weeks after the survey has closed.

Thanks so much for your collaboration. We hope you enjoy the survey.

Theresa Veer & Alexandra Zaby

PS: Please refer to our previous e-mail for further information below
_________________________________

Dear Madam or Sir,

The COVID-19 crisis has hit economies around the world. While politicians
struggle to mitigate the effects of this crisis on economies, they are
lacking detailed information on the impact of the crisis on (young) firms.

Reliable evidence from economic research is needed to base political
decisions on empirical evidence and truly help firms to cope with the
impact of COVID-19. For this, we are looking for your support. To better
understand how the COVID-19 crisis affects start-ups, we ask you to
participate in our short, ten-minute online survey.

After clicking the link you will be able to choose an English, Spanish or
German version of the questionnaire. Participation is entirely voluntary.
We are seeking information on how start-ups are coping with the crisis and
how they are affected. You can use any device for participating in the
survey, e.g., tablet, smartphone, laptop, etc. However, it may be more
convenient to use a large screen. The survey will be open for one week.
Please complete within this period.

As a token of our respect for your time, at the end of the survey you can
decide to participate in a lottery of Amazon vouchers (1 x $250, 2 x $100,
10 x $50). We will send out the vouchers to the winners of the lottery via
e-mail four weeks after the survey has closed.

Thanks so much for your collaboration. We hope you enjoy the survey.

Theresa Veer & Alexandra Zaby
Universität Tübingen, Germany & Privatuniversität Schloss Seeburg,
Austria

--

This e-mail was sent using SoSci Survey
(https://www.soscisurvey.de/en/contact ). For information about content and
privacy please contact Prof. Dr. Theresa Veer
<theresa.veer@uni-tuebingen.de>.

If you do not want to receive further e-mails via SoSci Survey, please
click here:
https://www.soscisurvey.de/admin/privacy.php?r=28845886&email=support%40wpperk.com
